Greenhoue Light level.comment: The light level emitted by the Greenhouses. Default : 9

Battery Capacity.comment: The capacity of the battery. Default : 1 000 000

Crop Generator : Production.comment: Amount of energy proudced by the Crop Generator. Default : 100 * Crop Tier

Battery Max Extract Amount.comment: Maximum amount of energy that can be extracted from the battery per tick. Default : 10 000

Deepslates Elematilius Ore Veins.comment: Number of deepslate elemarilius ore vein per chunk. Default : 2

Harvester Range.comment: The area will be range * range. Range need to be odd. Default : 5

Accelerator Stack Count.comment: How many working Accelerators you can place on top each over. Default : 5

Extra fruit drop.comment: Max amount of extra fruit dropped by a mature crop. Default : 0

Crop Generator : Mature Crop Multiplier.comment: Value of the multiplier when a mature crop is harvested. Default : *2

Deepslate Elematilius Ore Vein Size.comment: Deepslate elematilius ore Vein size. Default : 2

Elematilius Ore Veins.comment: Number of vein per chunk. Default : 5

Extra seed drop.comment: Max amount of extra fruit dropped by a mature crop. Default : 2

Patchouli Gudie Book.comment: Should give the book on first world join. Default : true

Crop Generator : Range.comment: The area will be range * range. Range need to be odd. Default : 5

Crop growth chance.comment: Percentage. Chance for a crop to grow. The smaller value between this global parameter and the crop parameter will be chosen. Default : 100%
